entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cookies lose implicit port after deserialization. #70227
  • NativeAOT Library Test Failures Don't Fail CI #70223
  • [Documentation] Add docs explaining the differences between Regex Source generator vs the inbox engines when using RegexOptions.IgnoreCase #70214
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][aot] `ArgumentNullException` in `System.Numerics.Tests.op_multiplyTest.RunMultiplyPositive` - Linux/AOT/v8 #70213
  • Better diagnostics for coreclr initialization failures #70211
    Future
  • Why LdapException.ServerErrorMessage is empty on Linux? #70210
  • Update PKCS tests to use documents that use SHA-2 where applicable #70209
    Future
  • Future of ISerializable, Serializable attribute and IDeserializationCallback interface #70208
  • PipeReaderStream.ReadInternal throws AggregateException unexpectedly #70206
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Extend Vector128[_1] wasm intrinsics #70199
  • X509Chain.Build() does not allow empty subject name in Xamarin #70196
  • Assertion at /Users/runner/work/1/s/src/mono/mono/metadata/class-setup-vtable.c:1007, condition `is_ok (error)' not met, function:apply_override, VAR 1 (V) cannot be expanded in this context with 1 instantiations #70190
  • Logic fault in supported COSE signature algorithm vlaidaiton #70189
    7.0.0
  • Analyzer for cases when the `Dispose()` pattern is introduced after the fact #70188

Closed

  • Profiler API: Add a new API to determine if object is in RO segment #12580
    7.0.0
  • Add Profiler API : GetObjectReferences #12548
    7.0.0
  • GenAPI needs to account for ref fields #63751
    7.0.0
  • libhostfxr.dylib fails after installing another version of .net #70163
  • Failures seen in nightly PGO runs #65585
    7.0.0
  • Loop cloning misses definitions for fields of promoted structs #61040
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: List<T>.ConvertAll overload that provides list index to converter #70200
  • Rebuild of native parts of coreclr and libraries doesn't work with cross build #65533
  • [Blazor WASM] AppDomain.CurrentDomain.FirstChanceException event leads to exception after publish #69721
    7.0.0
  • Creating a tar directly into a GZipStream crashes when writing final records #70172
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Hoist `GT_COMMA`s in CSE #70228
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move Environment.iOS.cs under libraries #70226
  • JIT: add missing cloning test case and fix jit dump #70225
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introduce AOT friendly version of ToLogFont and FromLogFont #70224
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • Optimization for full range checks (#70145) #70222
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ignoring test for NativeAOT since GetCallingAssembly is unsupported #70221
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add infrastructure for building WebWorkers #70220
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Delete a little more dead rationalizer code #70218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • NonBacktracking inner matching loop optimizations #70217
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [TODO-List-Cleanup] Delete obsolete code from `gtSetMultiOpOrder` #70216
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fixing the costing of GT_CNS_DBL and GT_CNS_VEC instructions #70215
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Test additional NativeAOT Lib testing #70212
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fold more `OBJ(ADDR(LCL))` patterns in multi-reg morphing #70207
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move HostAbortedException to Abstractions #70205
    area-Extensions-Hosting, needs-author-action
  • Update shared code from linker #70204
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable IlcTrimMetadata by default #70201
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use ClrSafeInt everywhere and cleanup other same math declarations #70197
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Try to use parameter for helix image names #70195
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono] Extend mono AOT compiler to ingest .mibc profiles #70194
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Test early md array lowering #70193
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Stop unnecessary exceptions from being thrown from crossgen when a reference is not actually a managed dll #70191
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Merged

  • Cryptography.Pkcs.Tests: make tests pass when rsa+sha1 signing is not supported. #70041
    area-System.Security
  • Simplify ReadyToRunCompilationGroupBase config #70192
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • JIT: fix invariant analysis for cloning #70126
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove unused winapi mimicking headers under PAL #70153
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Some cleanups in Native AOT suspension area #69885
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Consider targets of delegates reflection-visible #70198
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update CentOS7 image #69892
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Do not read position when tar archive stream is unseekable #70178
    area-System.IO
  • Add {M}IBC to glossary #68111
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Improve Encoding.UTF8.GetMaxByte/CharCount perf #69910
    area-System.Text.Encoding, 7.0.0
  • Ensure that GT_CNS_VEC is handled in LinearScan::isMatchingConstant #70171
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #69041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Enabling console logger queue length and mode to be configurable #70186
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Hoist the invariants out of multi-level nested loops #68061
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bug fixes from dead code elimination #69897
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Support new hot reload features #70097
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, area-EnC-mono
  • Move Format property to TarEntry and allow multiple Global Extended Attributes entries #69933
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Reenable 4244 warning for Mono. #70026
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Modify tests to distinguish between emit- and interpreted-based invoke #70114
    area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Fix linker ref param warnings #70082
    area-Meta
  • Fix race condition in WASM crypto worker #70185
    area-System.Security
  • Fix ICorDebugFunction2::GetVersionNumber for arm32. #69901
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Rooting `GT_COMMA` nodes #69918
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove complex marshalling support from crossgen2 #70183
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [wasm] Initial SIMD support #70086
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Search native code in all R2R images in version bubble #68607
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Safe size estimation for SymbolicRegexNode #70139
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [iOS] Grab the default timezone using native API #70149
    area-CoreLib-mono, os-ios
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE][wasm] debugging wbt failures on windows #70174
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • NativeAOT: Do not disambiguate calli thunks based on modops #70105
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Optimization. Use Min/Max intrinsics if one of arguments is constant. #69434
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Optimize Matrix4x4 Decompose with fewer stores #66351
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Add ZipArchiveEntry.IsEncrypted for password-protection detection #70036
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Ensure side effects get spilled for the various hwintrinsic and simdashwintrinsic nodes #70054
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement UnixFileMode APIs #69980
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Add retry mechanism to test execution process #70023
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Use Roslyn support for RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan #70179
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • JIT ARM32: Fix passing odd sized structs from arbitrary sources #70075
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Bring Enum.InternalBoxEnum to C# (CoreCLR) #70181
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm]: JavaScript interop with [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes and Roslyn #66304
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Forbid creating layout-less `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_FLD` nodes #70170
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] Buffered reads #70148
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [wasm] Properly handle trailing whitespace in the URL for the HttpClient #70154
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Update to use Mariner 2.0 as the build image #70111
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for delegate GDV and method-based vtable GDV #68703
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Added Default Interface Method static tests. #70138
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Added Default Interface Method tests. #70002
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Reflection.Metadata.Tests: make tests pass when rsa+sha1 signing is not supported. #69999
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • [NO MERGE] Upgrade SDK to 7.0.100-preview.5.22276.4 #70117
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Fix some scaling issues with the global queue in the thread pool #69386
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Implement NarrowUtf16ToAscii for AArch64 #70080
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • [Android] Fix app crash when using non-native HttpClientHandler #69565
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • WIP: Cross module work #68919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Improve string.Format / {Value}StringBuilder.AppendFormat parsing throughput #69757
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Use IndexOf{Any} in a few more places #70176
    area-Meta
  • JIT: Handle enums in box-unbox optimization #70167
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add path to global.json in SDK resolution error message when it's available #25823
    7.0.1xx

Closed

  • When multiple TargetFrameworks are used, RunProduceContentAssets is skipped on rebuild #25504
  • Support wildcard versions in baseline package validation #23772
    7.0.1xx
  • dotnet watch does not support the --launch-profile parameter #25815
  • Address obsolete ContentItemGroup.FindItems in PackageValidation #23301

PullRequests

Created

  • Switch NuGet assets for tests as tools to be under the test execution… #25837
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add --skip-sign-check option to repair, uninstall, and update #25834
    Area-Workloads
  • Ensure the Razor generator doesn't generate when it's suppressed #25833
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for specifying launch profile to `dotnet watch run` #25832
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support workload pack groups for repair, download, and show URL operations #25829
  • Follow-Up on compatibility tooling refactoring #25816
    Area-Compatibility

Merged

  • Include requested .NET SDK version when known #25733
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.1xx-preview5] Integrate new user-jwts tool into SDK #25771
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore
  • [main] Integrate dotnet user-jwts tools into SDK #25757
    Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • add rules to catch addition or removal of 'virtual' modifier #25734
    Area-Compatibility
  • Update man pages #25755
  • Allow dotnet workload update print-download-link-only to work with when update available in newer feature band #25669
    Area-Workloads
  • Implement functionality for templating workload and version constraints #25505
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Need telemetry for how often a code-action with UI has its UI cancelled. #61694
  • Further improvements of EditAndContinueLanguageService.HasChangesAsync #61692
    17.4
  • Parenthes completion doesn't work sometimes #61680
    Backlog
  • EnC: Allow deleting methods #61678
    17.3

Closed

  • IDE0072 Add missing cases not well implemented when nullable #61594
    Backlog
  • Converting Expression<Func<Person,object>> to string may be unusable when used for code generation. #61691
  • Current CI-produced VSIXes can't be installed using the scripts provided for that #45327
  • Make `Throw` a control keyword in VB #61687
    Backlog
  • Test plan for "extended nameof scope" #40524
    17.3
  • CSharpCodeFixTest test code with Record keyword, give CS0518 error #61655
  • IDE0017 is not proposed in top-level code #61066
    Backlog
  • Roslyn does not load ASP.NET Core 2 documents #21660
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • WIP: Replace conditional with assignment #61697
    Area-IDE
  • Remove ISupportDirectMemoryAccess. #61693
    Area-IDE
  • Use fast in-proc heuristic to implement HasChangesAsync #61690
    Interactive-EnC, 17.3
  • Require spaces within line span directives and relax LangVer check #61686
    Area-Compilers
  • Unwrap unexpected AggregateException for clarity #61684
    Area-Compilers
  • Add a hack to remove output from the Razor generator if suppressed #61675
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Nullable annotate the lexer and a few related files #61688
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Fixed nullability of enums in switches #61683
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Update xunit.analyzers #46349
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Change target branch for release/dev17.3 #61696
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Stop attempting to include InteractiveComponents VSIX #45159
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Updates based on Visual Studio 2019 Version 16.10 #53966
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Update compiler to supported UnmanagedMemoryStream when creating ModuleMetadata. #61630
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61695
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove unneeded ProjectReferences in ExpressionEvaluator layer #51474
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Remove unneeded IVTs in Interactive layer #51476
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Classify Throw as a control keyword in VB #61689
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Cache the AssemblyMetadata produced for any given compilation #61649
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61679
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Support 'scoped' modifier for parameters and locals #61389
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • F# External Access - Removed loc entries that are not used. #39006
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Extend TypeDeclarationStructureTests with records #48161
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Utilize behaviour for unexisting features of syntax facts in VB #61685
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Switch backing store for callback-array to an immutable structure so it cannot change as we are enumerating over it. #61671
    Area-IDE, Next
  • do not attempt to add ErrorCode.WRN_ShouldNotReturn twice in ErrorFacts #61682
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Fixed collection and object initializer usage analysis not working in top-level code #61584
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #61681
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Allow SyntaxOffset in EnC state machine map to be negative #61667
    Area-Interactive
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61677
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #61676
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add AspNetCoreCSharpVirtualCharService #61673
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61672
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge for 17.3 Preview 2 snap #61674
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Ref fields escape analysis #61195
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61698
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Increase severity of local function naming style to Warning #31716
    Area-Infrastructure, Concept-Continuous Improvement
  • Find implementation assemblies for reference assemblies in the .NET SDK #61526
    Area-IDE
  • Implements automated VSIX and NuGet feeds for easy feature dogfooding #45195
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge semantic snippets into main #61658
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add helper for source generators to filter to nodes with attribute matching an attribute name #61293
    Area-Compilers
  • Do not use `SourceText` indexer when parsing #61662
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Use RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan for array initialization with relevant primitives #61414
    Area-Compilers
  • File types emit #61646
    Area-Compilers
  • Include the Server GC descriptors in local ServiceHub deployment #53595
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Run C# semantic tests with server GC #43739
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove unneeded ProjectReferences in Workspaces layer #51477
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Set IDE0008 severity #52951
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Generate static field for ReadOnlySpan created from array without an initializer (#33088) #37897
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Cleanups for our logging helpers #61669
    Area-IDE
  • Cover the 'end' cases in AutomaticLineEnderTests #51703
    Area-IDE
  • Write up some docs on what binaries ship where #52619
    Area-IDE
  • Remove some outdated configurations in tools #52800
    Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Only subscribe to AppDomain.AssemblyResolve once #53166
    Area-Analyzers
  • Fix VisualStudioWorkspaceImpl.CanApplyChange around options #45243
    Area-IDE
  • Code diagnostic and fix provider for 45832 "Make anonymous function static" #46429
    Area-IDE, Community
  • 🧹 Services cleanup following previous review #49127
    Area-IDE
  • Document why we have -vs-deps branches #41153
    Area-Infrastructure, Documentation
  • Fix the project layout #61547
    Area-Compilers
  • Reducing allocations in completion #61620
    Area-IDE
  • Null annotate the implementations of ISyntaxTreeFactoryService #48820
    Area-IDE
  • AsynchronousOperationListener cleanup #48825
    Area-IDE
  • Allow index initialisers to be used in fixed size buffers. #39805
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • 🔽 Move RoslynPackage.ComponentModel to AbstractPackage #40864
    Area-IDE, Backlog
  • Log long-running operations between integration tests #33101
    Area-IDE, Integration-Test
  • Adjust error wording for members in top-level programs #59734
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Completion is not provided inside curly braces settings if the preceeding text contains 'is' #33961
    Area-IDE, Backlog
  • Remove IDocumentOperationService.SupportsDiagnostics #34009
    Area-IDE, Blocked, Concept-Continuous Improvement
  • Add Typescript integration tests #19589
    Area-Infrastructure, cla-already-signed
  • Organize contributing notes and add WSL testing section #61408
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Set a non-fatal error handler that rethrows exceptions in tests #36565
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Determine the maximum supported language version #37018
    Area-IDE
  • Don't generate nullable attributes when implementing interfaces/abstract classes #38203
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Make a perf tweak in the DataTipInfoGetter #24296
    Area-IDE
  • Rename methods with conditional success to Try* pattern #27915
    Area-IDE
  • Implement AsyncLazyInitializer #31060
    Area-IDE
  • Delete ImmutableHashMap #31408
    Area-IDE, Concept-Continuous Improvement, Backlog
  • Editor Completion: the rest of projection scenarios tests #31769
    Area-IDE, Test, Backlog
  • Decouple a bit of RenameTrackingTaggerProvider #31890
    Area-IDE
  • Fixed incorrect discard suggestion in var pattern #61657
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Prefer stack storage for highly-contended temporary array #61670
    Area-Compilers
  • Calculate containing type effective accessibility for required member enforcement #61643
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • ✨ Implement ImmutableSegmentedHashSet<T> #54719
    Area-Compilers
  • Switch AsyncCompletion to new pooled CompletionItemList based APIs #61477
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update to Bootstrap v5.2 #42025
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Update React project template to React v18.1 #42024
    7.0-preview7
  • Update Angular project template to use Angular v14 #42022
    7.0-preview7
  • Use ToString() of bool instead of normal boolean strings in HostingAbstractionsWebHostBuilderExtensions #42020
  • Perf improvement: json #42019
  • Remove explicit parameterName from calls to ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull where it can be inferred via the CallerMemberNameAttribute #42018
  • Logging intermittently stops until website is recycled. #42017
  • Change Kestrel's HTTPS endpoint defaults to improve developer experience #42016
    7.0-preview6
  • Blazor Server Side: Implement a simple way to dispose of components #42015
  • Problem validators langage use when there is a decimal field in a form #42014
  • SignalR: Distributed HubConnectionStore #42011
  • Certificate authentication fails validation when intermediate certificate isn't in store #42010
  • DistributedSession always loads session in CommitAsync even when session is not modified #42009
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Enable CA1854 analyser #42008

Closed

  • Protocol buffer generator declares identifiers that cause CS8981 warnings #42028
  • RequestDecompression middleware #40080
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [Theme] Add support for migrating .NET Framework apps to .NET Core #40078
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Why HashPassword method inside Identity PasswordHasher<T> class has TUser as a parameter ? #41898
  • Method not found error. Project in net core 6.0. I use Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity 2.2.0 #40068
    Discussions
  • browserlink CSP support .NET 7 #42007
  • Blazor Make Default Template Favicon Blazor Logo #39159
    7.0-preview6
  • Asp.net core DI error #41881
  • [Trimming] Consider using standard <IsTrimmable> property #41016
    7.0-preview5
  • Produce a System.Web.HttpContext adapter based on ASP.NET Core HTTP types #40001
    7.0-preview3

PullRequests

Created

  • Define `$(HelixTestConfigurationFilePath)` #42029
    area-infrastructure
  • Change project templates to have separate "http" and "https" launch profiles #42027
    area-mvc
  • Remove explicit parameterName #42026
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Update TFM for reference assemblies in analyzer tests #42023
    area-infrastructure, analyzer, area-web-frameworks
  • Did the first task of issue #42016: removing the default address (https://localhost:5001) for https #42021
    area-runtime
  • [user-jwts] Read and generate secrets ID with SecretsManager #42006
    area-commandlinetools, area-web-frameworks, feature-userjwts

Merged

  • DataProtection use 6.0 app discriminator trailing slash format #41849
    area-dataprotection, 7.0-preview6
  • Add Request Decompression middleware #40279
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview6
  • Adding WebTransport Handshake to Kestrel #41877
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview6
  • Blazor Make Default Template Favicon Blazor Logo #41991
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview6
  • Fix backport github action #42013
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 7.0-preview6
  • Enable trim analyzer #41683
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview6

Updated

  • Implement Http/2 WebSockets #41558
    area-runtime
  • RequestDelegateFactory context classes ApplicationServices property #41952
    area-runtime, * NO MERGE *
  • Add support for logging additional request headers #41753
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Added a new doc for adding projects to the repo #41949
    area-infrastructure
  • (Corrected) Generate Full Composite Images of .NET and ASP.NET Bundled Together #41855
    area-infrastructure
  • Backport 39275 to release/6.0 #41993
    Servicing-consider, area-web-frameworks, 6.0.x
  • Implemented minimal WebTransport Middleware #41945
    area-runtime
  • Kestrel: Support full cert chain #41944
    area-runtime
  • Add support for reading default scheme from config #41987
    area-security
  • Look at IIS functionals #41995
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GetPublishedProcesses() throws the exception when there is the pipe with invalid symbol in system. #3104

PullRequests

Created

  • Change GetCurrentTarget and GetService ret type from HResult to int #3103

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Border set in maui styles.xaml is ignored in a xaml page #7744
  • How make friends projects MAUI blazor(Not library) and Blazor Client(WebAssembly)? #7743
  • Android app crashes after splash screen - [OpenGLRenderer] unknown bitmap configuration #7737
  • Update schema reference in ide.host.json files #7735
    6.0-sr1
  • Cannot publish .aab MAUI solution #7734
  • The theme does not apply on iOS #7733
  • The app styles does not react when theme changes #7730
  • TabbedPage: Add Content page with Constructor Dependencies #7728
  • The invisible element holds space on iOS #7727
  • CollectionView SelectedItems not rendering on android until scrolling #7726
  • How can I build Universal 2 Mac builds? #7725
  • Can't find my app resource file with iOS #7722
  • Black area above and below the application with iOS #7721
  • Android WebView FullScreen for video #7720
  • CreateContainer possible Bug in Windows #7718
  • Maui multi target projects don't appear to support linked files? #7717
  • Build and deploy slow #7716
  • Unable to set app icon #7715

Closed

  • [MacCatalyst] Application crashes when it is signed with added Entitlements.plist #7693
    6.0-sr2
  • Windows Embedded Font in new handler #7598

PullRequests

Created

  • BlazorWebView WPF tab navigation improvements #7742
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Update ide.host.json schema. #7736
    area/templates 📄, 6.0-sr1
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22301.1 to 7.0.0-preview1.22302.1 #7731

    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton, 6.0-sr1
  • Fix issue rendering Brushes binding GradientStop colors #7719
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, control-frame, 6.0-sr1

Merged

  • [net6.0] Bump iOS versions #7741
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [build] Version .NET VS manifest file #7704
    area/setup 🪄, .NET 7
  • Bump Xamarin.UITest from 3.2.7 to 3.2.8 #7697
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #7714
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22277.2 to 7.0.0-preview1.22301.1 #7696
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • Update to .NET 7 SDKs #7375
    do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • More info on templates #7430
    area/templates 📄, 6.0-sr1

    area/collectionview 📃, 6.0-sr1
  • Preserve the correct binding context for menu items #7358
    area/desktop 🖥️, 6.0-sr1
  • [iOS] Clip Border content based on StrokeShape property #7335
    area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, 6.0-sr1
  • [iOS] Fix issue not rendering Border background using a Shadow #7695

    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, 6.0-sr1
  • [iOS] Fix issue using gradients in Button with Corner Radius #7666

  • [Tizen] Fix RendererToHandlerShim.Tizen #7622

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Query: Provide a way to indicate that part of a query should translate to server or throw #28155
  • Shadow property for Primary Key - exception 'No backing field could be found' #28154
  • Cannot save changes for an entity of type 'ExternalObject' in state 'Unchanged'. #28152
  • Consider adding EF.Param to force parameterization in query #28151
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException and NullReferenceException during SqliteCommand.Dispose #28150
  • Loading resources in DbContext constructor causes Add-Migration to fail. #28149

Closed

  • groupby with a comparator #28138
